designIncludes.title: 100% Custom Design
designIncludes.description: No templates—your site is designed and developed from scratch to fit your unique project needs, goals, and style.

designIncludes.title: Modern Web Standards
designIncludes.description: Built with current CSS and HTML standards for smooth performance and consistent rendering across all browsers.

designIncludes.title: Fully Responsive
designIncludes.description: Layouts automatically adapt to any screen size—desktops, tablets, and phones—future-proofed for devices yet to come.

designIncludes.title: Traffic Analytics
designIncludes.description: See how many visitors come to your site, how long they stay, where they click, and what devices they use.

hostingIncludes.title: Easy-to-Use CMS
hostingIncludes.description: Update content directly without touching code. No complicated backend systems—just click, edit, and publish.

hostingIncludes.title: Content Version History
hostingIncludes.description: Every edit is saved with 90 days of revision history. Accidentally delete something? Restore it with a few clicks.

hostingIncludes.title: Blazing Fast Hosting
hostingIncludes.description: Hosted on 100+ datacenter servers worldwide via Fastly and Amazon CloudFront with 99.9% uptime.

hostingIncludes.title: SSL Security
hostingIncludes.description: Keeps your site secure and encrypted. Google also rewards SSL-enabled sites with better search rankings.

hostingIncludes.title: Troubleshooting & Fixes
hostingIncludes.description: If something on your site malfunctions, it gets fixed at no extra charge.

benefits.title: Workflow Automation
benefits.description: Eliminates repetitive manual tasks with intelligent processing.

benefits.title: Data Validation
benefits.description: Catches errors before they cause problems downstream.

benefits.title: Intuitive Dashboard
benefits.description: Clear visibility into tasks, status, and deadlines at a glance.

benefits.title: Email Integration
benefits.description: Automated notifications sent directly to team inboxes.

benefits.title: Custom Branding
benefits.description: Your logo, colors, and identity throughout the application.

benefits.title: Fully Accessible
benefits.description: WCAG compliant and responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile.

benefits.title: Role-Based Access
benefits.description: Secure permissions ensure users only see data relevant to their role.

benefits.title: Secure Data Handling
benefits.description: Encrypted storage protects sensitive information at rest and in transit.

benefits.title: Export & Reports
benefits.description: Download data and generate professional reports in multiple formats.

upsells.title: Ongoing Maintenance
upsells.description: Updates, bug fixes, and feature enhancements over time.

upsells.title: Priority Support
upsells.description: Dedicated support channel with faster response times and scheduled check-ins.

defaultPhases.name: Discovery & Requirements
defaultPhases.description: Document workflows, define user roles, and map system requirements.

defaultPhases.name: Architecture & Design
defaultPhases.description: Database structure, user interface wireframes, and system architecture.

defaultPhases.name: Core Development
defaultPhases.description: Build application functionality, user authentication, and data processing.

defaultPhases.name: Testing & Refinement
defaultPhases.description: Quality assurance, user acceptance testing, and bug fixes.

defaultPhases.name: Deployment & Training
defaultPhases.description: Launch to production, user documentation, and training session.
